mapper.select: /*[AdminModelApi_SQL.xml].[getModelList] */ SELECT tm.idx, tm.category_cd, tm.category_nm, tm.category_age, tm.model_kor_name, tm.model_eng_name, tm.model_description, tm.visible, tm.height, tm.size3, tm.shoes, tm.create_time FROM tsp_model tm WHERE tm.visible = 'Y' AND category_cd = #{categoryCd} ORDER BY tm.idx ASC LIMIT #{startPage}, #{size}

/*[AdminModelApi_SQL.xml].[getModelInfo] */ SELECT tm.idx, tm.category_cd, tm.category_nm, tm.category_age, tm.model_kor_name, tm.model_eng_name, tm.model_description, tm.visible, tm.height, tm.size3, tm.shoes FROM tsp_model tm WHERE tm.visible = 'Y' AND tm.category_cd = #{categoryCd} AND tm.idx = #{idx}

/*[AdminModelApi_SQL.xml].[getImageList] */ SELECT idx, type_idx, type_name, file_num, file_name, file_size, concat('/upload/',file_mask) AS file_mask, file_path, image_type, reg_date FROM tsp_image WHERE type_name = 'model' AND type_idx = #{typeIdx} ORDER BY file_num ASC
mapper.insert: /*[AdminModelApi_SQL.xml].[insertModel] */ INSERT INTO tsp_model(category_cd, category_nm, category_age, model_kor_name, model_eng_name, height, shoes, size3, model_description, visible, creator, create_time, updater, update_time) VALUES (#{categoryCd}, #{categoryNm}, #{categoryAge}, #{modelKorName}, #{modelEngName}, #{height}, #{shoes}, #{size3}, #{modelDescription}, #{visible}, '1', now(), '1', now())
mapper.update: /*[AdminModelApi_SQL.xml].[updateModel] */ UPDATE tsp_model SET model_kor_name = #{modelKorName}, model_eng_name = #{modelEngName}, model_description = #{modelDescription}, category_age = #{categoryAge}, height = #{height}, size3 = #{size3}, shoes = #{shoes}, updater = #{updater}, update_time = NOW() WHERE idx = #{idx} AND category_cd = #{categoryCd}
mapper.insert: /*[AdminModelApi_SQL.xml].[insertModelOpt] */ INSERT INTO tsp_model_opt(model_idx, height, size3, shoes, creator, create_time, updater, update_time) VALUES (#{modelIdx}, #{height}, #{size3}, #{shoes}, '1', now(), '1', now())
